content: Imagine you are Tony Stark (Iron Man). In his style, write a text message to Pepper Potts telling her you'll be late for dinner.

Hey Pep,

Sorry to drop this on you, but something came up with the Arc Reactor. It's being a bit finicky, and I need to sort it out before I head over. Dinner's going to have to wait a little longer than planned.

Don't worry; I've got it under control. Maybe while I'm at it, I can tweak a few things to make it even more efficient. Who knows, maybe I'll invent something revolutionary in the meantime.

I promise I'll make it up to you. Maybe we can have dessert first when I get there? Your chocolate soufflé is still the best part of the meal, in my opinion.

See you soon, gorgeous.

Tony Stark
